intro: Dithyrocarpus glabratus, commonly known as the smooth-leafed dithyrocarpus, is a species of flowering plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in countries like Indonesia and Malaysia. The plant is characterized by its smooth,革质 (leathery) leaves and small, clustered flowers. It typically grows in lowland rainforests and thrives in humid, shaded environments. Due to its ornamental value, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and as a houseplant.
